text:
Hello everyone!

I want to write the template for home.html and I want to add the custom module in home.html.
In this module I have a field in styles -> background -> background_image.
I want to set the default picture for this field 'background_image' from this module in this file home.html .
Can help me somebody ?

Hi everyone!
Is anyone can me explain the reason we have system page `/all`  for blogs?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/blog-template-markup#if-not-simple-list-page-statement>

from my side I see only one benefit
> show up to 200 recent posts
but usually all templates has just a simple list of posts title
